price: (213) So do not invoke[1064] with Allāh another deity and [thus] be among the punished.
arabic: فَلَا تَدۡعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُعَذَّبِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: falā tadʿu maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fatakūna mina al-muʿadhabīna
